task.role: You are a Senior Rust Engineer with expertise in systems programming and APIs. Implement Task 9 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Implement full CRUD operations for tasks with filtering and soft delete
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create src/handlers/tasks.rs 2. CRUD endpoints: POST, GET, PATCH, DELETE /api/teams/:id/tasks 3. Task fields: title, description, assignee_id, status, due_date, deleted_at 4. Add filtering by status, assignee, due date range 5. Implement soft delete with 30-day retention 6. Add task assignment validation

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-9): Build task management system

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Test all CRUD operations, filtering combinations, soft delete behavior, and authorization
